uk.org.taverna.server.client.util
Class URIUtils

java.lang.Object
  uk.org.taverna.server.client.util.URIUtils

public final class URIUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A small set of utility methods to ease working with URIs. URI objects are immutable which can be annoying to work with when string manipulation-like operations are required.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Robert Haines

appendToPath

public static java.net.URI appendToPath(java.net.URI uri,
                                        java.lang.String extraPath)
Append a path to the end of an existing URI's path.

Parameters:
uri - the URI on which to append the extra path.
extraPath - the extra path to be appended to the URI.
Returns:
the new URI with the extended path.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a mal-formed URI or path is passed in.

extractFinalPathComponent

public static java.lang.String extractFinalPathComponent(java.net.URI uri)
Extract the final component of the URI's path. If there is no path, or the path ends with / the empty String is returned. So:
  • http://example.org/this/is/a/path would yield path,
  • http://example.org would yield the empty String and
  • http://example.org/path/ would also yield the empty String.

Parameters:
uri - the URI to get the final path component of.
Returns:
the final path component of the passed in URI.

setQuery

public static java.net.URI setQuery(java.net.URI uri,
                                    java.lang.String query)
Set the query part of a URI.

Parameters:
uri - the URI to receive a new query part.
query - the query to set (with or without the leading ?).
Returns:
the new URI with its query part set.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a mal-formed URI or query is passed in.
